001// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-or-later
002
003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.mentionfiltering;
004
005import java.util.Collections;
006import java.util.HashMap;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Map;
009import java.util.Set;
010import java.util.regex.Pattern;
011
012import javax.persistence.PersistenceException;
013
014import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.entity.ProcessedDocument;
015import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.AbstractProcessingStep;
016import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.ProcessingException;
017import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.mentionfiltering.entity.MentionFilteredTextDocument;
018import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.mentionfiltering.entity.MentionFilteredTextWithTitleDocument;
019import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.mentionfiltering.xml.definition.MentionTypeProcessingStepParameter;
020
021/**
022 * Removes all the mentions in a document, according to the provided mention
023 * type.
024 * <p>
025 * Example declaration for this step in a process definition file:
026 * </p>
027 * <pre>
028 * {@code <step action="MentionFiltering">
029 *      <parameters>
030 *              <textDocumentWithTitleTableName>tokenized_submission</textDocumentWithTitleTableName>
031 *              <textDocumentTableName>tokenized_comment</textDocumentTableName>
032 *              <mf:mentionType>reddit_all</mf:mentionType>
033 *      </parameters>
034 * </step>}
035 * </pre>
036 *
037 * @author Alejandro González García
038 */
039final class MentionFilteringProcessingStep extends AbstractProcessingStep {
040        private static final String MENTION_TYPE_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME = new MentionTypeProcessingStepParameter().getName();
041
042        private static final Map<String, Pattern> MENTION_REGEXES = Map.of(
043                "reddit_all", Pattern.compile(
044                        "(?:/[\\p{Blank}]*)?[ru][\\p{Blank}]*/[\\p{Blank}]*[^\\p{Blank}]+",
045                        Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE | Pattern.UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS
046                ),
047                "reddit_user", Pattern.compile(
048                        "(?:/[\\p{Blank}]*)?u[\\p{Blank}]*/[\\p{Blank}]*[^\\p{Blank}]+",
049                        Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE | Pattern.UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS
050                ),
051                "subreddit", Pattern.compile(
052                        "(?:/[\\p{Blank}]*)?r[\\p{Blank}]*/[\\p{Blank}]*[^\\p{Blank}]+",
053                        Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE | Pattern.UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS
054                )
055        );
056
057        /**
058         * Instantiates a mention filtering processing step.
059         */
060        MentionFilteringProcessingStep() {
061                super(
062                        // Additional mandatory and optional parameters, with their validation function
063                        Map.of(
064                                MENTION_TYPE_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME, (final String value) -> MENTION_REGEXES.containsKey(value)
065                        ),
066                        // Additional mandatory parameters
067                        Set.of(
068                                MENTION_TYPE_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME
069                        )
070                );
071        }
072
073        @Override
074        protected void run() throws ProcessingException {
075                final List<Class<? extends ProcessedDocument>> processedDocumentTypes = List.of(
076                        MentionFilteredTextWithTitleDocument.class, MentionFilteredTextDocument.class
077                );
078                final Pattern mentionRegex = MENTION_REGEXES.get(
079                        getParameters().get(MENTION_TYPE_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME)
080                );
081                final Pattern severalSpaceRegex = Pattern.compile("[\\p{Blank}]{2,}", Pattern.UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS);
082
083                try {
084                        // Delete previous results
085                        for (final Class<? extends ProcessedDocument> processedDocumentType : processedDocumentTypes) {
086                                deleteAllProcessedDocumentsOfType(processedDocumentType);
087                        }
088
089                        for (int i = 0; i < processedDocumentTypes.size(); ++i) {
090                                final String[] unprocessedAttributeNames = unprocessedDocumentsAttributes.get(i);
091                                final Class<? extends ProcessedDocument> processedDocumentType = processedDocumentTypes.get(i);
092
093                                forEachDocumentInNativeQuery(
094                                        unprocessedDocumentsQuerySuppliers.get(i),
095                                        String.format("Filtering %s mentions", unprocessedDocumentTypesNames.get(i)),
096                                        numberOfUnprocessedEntitiesProviders.get(i).get(),
097                                        (final List<String[]> batchAttributes) -> {
098                                                final Map<String, String> processedAttributesMap = new HashMap<>(
099                                                        (int) Math.ceil(unprocessedAttributeNames.length / 0.75)
100                                                );
101
102                                                for (final String[] documentAttributes : batchAttributes) {
103                                                        for (int j = 0; j < unprocessedAttributeNames.length; ++j) {
104                                                                processedAttributesMap.put(unprocessedAttributeNames[j], severalSpaceRegex.matcher(
105                                                                        mentionRegex.matcher(documentAttributes[j + 1]).replaceAll("")
106                                                                ).replaceAll(""));
107                                                        }
108
109                                                        saveProcessedDocument(
110                                                                processedDocumentType, Integer.parseInt(documentAttributes[0]),
111                                                                Collections.unmodifiableMap(processedAttributesMap)
112                                                        );
113                                                }
114                                        },
115                                        null
116                                );
117                        }
118                } catch (final IllegalArgumentException | PersistenceException exc) {
119                        throw new ProcessingException(DATA_ACCESS_EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, exc);
120                }
121        }
122}
